entry.content:
If you want a reference to show you practical solutions, or just want to satisfy your need for more knowledge of this fantastic NoSQL database, then this book is ideal for you. To get the most out of this book, you should know the basics of MongoDB.

Downloader

The Definitive Guide to MongoDB, Second Edition, is updated for the latest version and includes all of the latest MongoDB features, including the aggregation framework introduced in version 2.2 and hashed indexes in version 2.4. MongoDB is the most popular of the "Big Data" NoSQL database technologies, and it's still growing. David Hows from 10gen, along with experienced MongoDB authors Peter Membrey and Eelco Plugge, provide their expertise and experience in teaching you everything you need to know to become a MongoDB pro. What youll learn Set up MongoDB on all major serverplatform...

Professional Linux Programming.
As Linux increases its presence throughout the world as a target platform for professional application development, its growth as a powerful, flexible system offering many free development tools assures its place in the future. By giving you easy access to this comprehensive range of tools, supporting new and nascent technologies, at little or no cost, developing with Linux allows you to apply the solution that's right for you.

entry.title: Acerca
entry.content:
En Eureka/Pdfhandbooks 
Partimos de la motivación de poner a disposición de todo aquel interesado una serie de manuales para que estos puedan fortalecer sus desarrollo académico/profesional/personal en diferentes áreas. Esperamos contar con su contribución y participación para continuar creciendo. 

Si usted esta interesado en colaborar solo tiene que ponerse en contacto e indicar en que esta dispuesto, la colaboración esta centrada en el aporte de manuales elaborados a partir de sus apuntes técnicos u otro tipo, script funcionales en diferentes lenguajes de programación, etc. Solo tiene que ponerse en contacto, manifestar sus inquietudes y a la brevedad le responderemos.  

Tambien podria colaborar realizando alguna donación.

We start from the motivation of making available to all those interested a series of manuals so that these can strengthen their academic/professional/personal development in different areas. We hope to count on your contribution and participation to continue growing.

If you are interested in collaborating you just have to contact and indicate what is available, the collaboration is centered on the contribution of manuals prepared from your technical notes or other type, functional script in different programming languages, etc. Just have to get in touch, express your concerns and we will respond as soon as possible.


You could also collaborate making a donation.

Downloader


Device drivers make it possible for your software to communicate with your hardware, and because every operating system has specific requirements, driver writing is nontrivial. When developing for FreeBSD, you've probably had to scour the Internet and dig through the kernel sources to figure out how to write the drivers you need. Thankfully, that stops now. In FreeBSD Device Drivers, Joseph Kong will teach you how to master everything from the basics of building and running loadable kernel modules to more complicated topics like thread synchronization.
